name: The Lonely
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Psychic Leech
traits.desc: At the start of each of the Lonely's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

traits.name: Thrives on Company
traits.desc: The Lonely has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.
